title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5021.2 - Eligibility requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5021.2 - Eligibility requirements

State Regulations

The retired member of the Retirement Board must be a retired
member of the New York State Teachers' Retirement System. Any candidate or
alternate candidate for election to the position of retired member of the Board
must have retired no later than the first day of July of the year in which the
election for the position is held. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 21

5021.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
